gurmukhi: bRXQwvMqY jMqY jYsy bYd aupcwru krY bRXQw biRqwNqu suin hrY duK rog kau
transliteration: Byadaavantai Jantai Jaisay Baid Oupachaaru Karai , Byadaa Britaantu Souni Harai Doukh Rog Kau ?
translation: As a medicine practitioner listens to the ailment of a patient and treats him for the malady;

gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw ihq icq kY imlq suqY Kwn pwn poiK qoiK hrq hY sog kau
transliteration: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa Hit Chit Kai Milat Soutai , Khaan Paan Pokhi Tokhi Harat Hai Sog Kau ?
translation: As parents fondly and lovingly meet their son, bring him up by serving dainty dishes, feel happy to allay all his distresses;

gurmukhi: ibrhnI binqw kau jYsy Brqwru imlY pRym rs kY hrq ibrh ibEg kau
transliteration: Birahanee Banitaa Kau Jaisay Bharataaru Milai , Praym Ras Kai Harat Birah Biaog Kau ?
translation: As a wife separated from her husband for long relieves her pangs of separation and distresses with loving emotions;

gurmukhi: qYsy hI ibbykI jn praupkwr hyq imlq sill giq shj sMjog kau ]113]
transliteration: Taisay Hee Bibaykee Jan Paraoupakaar Hayta , Milat Salil Gati Sahaj Sanjog Kau ?113?
translation: Similarly those wise and realised servers of Lord dyed in the hue of Lord's name become humble like water and meets the needy who yearn for the divine solace and clemency. (113)
